bug.author: user42de
bug.summary: File not supported format for extension in capital letters
bug.description:
Describe the bug If you try to process an image with an extension written in capital letters (e.g. image.JPG) dreampower says the file format is not supported. If the name is changed to image.jpg it works fine again. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Take image name.JPG Process Get error
Expected behavior Checking of extension should be case-insensitive Enviroment (please complete the following information):
DreamPower Version 1.2.3 OS: Win10

comments.comment: added a fix in canary branch, until it's deployed you can rename the file name to lowercase.
